article.headline: Mercer 79, Fort Valley State 74
article.story: MACON, Ga. (AP) -- James Florence scored 28 points and Shaddean Aaron added 22 to lead Mercer to a 79-74 victory over Fort Valley State on Thursday night. Mercer (4-4) led throughout after taking a 15-12 lead on Aaron's three-point play less than six minutes into the game, but the Wildcats (0-3) trailed by only 35-32 at halftime. Florence's 3-pointer extended Mercer's lead to 50-43 with 12:51 to play. He hit another 3-pointer to make it 53-46 less than a minute later, and a third one to give the Bears a 60-48 lead at 9:51. Fort Valley State never came closer than six points after that until the final 11 seconds, when Ray Northern's 3-pointer provided the game's final points. Greg Sanders had 19 points and 10 rebounds for Fort Valley State.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
